function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of hygiene and sanitation practices in public spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Implementation of regular cleaning, waste management, and sanitation practices","Technologies":"Smart waste management systems, UV-C disinfection technology","People":"Local community, visitors, and residents","Owner":"Local government, community organizations"},{"Description":"Close proximity and interaction in public spaces","Impact":"Higher likelihood of contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Promotion of physical distancing, installation of hand hygiene stations, and enforcement of mask-wearing policies","Technologies":"Contactless technologies for transactions, occupancy monitoring sensors","People":"Local community, visitors, and residents","Owner":"Local government, property owners, and businesses"},{"Description":"Lack of guidance and planning in placemaking initiatives","Impact":"Inefficient use of public spaces, leading to overcrowding and potential health hazards","Mitigation":"Comprehensive planning and design with consideration for space utilization and public health guidelines","Technologies":"Urban planning software, crowd density monitoring technology","People":"Urban planners, architects, local community","Owner":"Municipal government, urban planning authorities"}]}
